posts.postText:
Offender name:Dr.Shanelololololololololol
Offender's Steam ID:STEAM_0:1:22686397
What the Offender did:
He welded the props up top to the props on the floor.
He technically wasn't "skybasing" because his props weren't welded to the ceiling. But its bullshit because those props don't float. He prop surfs to get up there before the round starts, and cant lose because of how much damage it takes to kill him. Each of the props has 2k health and he has about 8 of them.
There is no way in hell you can be underwater long enough to destroy even one of the "supports" And you dont have enough time to destroy all of them up top.
Were there any admins on at the time?:Yes, Dum and Quack
